title: Chetak e-scooter: Bajaj Auto looks to double network for its iconic brand's electric version in coming weeks
description: Bookings for the Chetak have been opened in an additional 12 cities - Coimbatore, Madurai, Kochi, Kozhikode, Hubli, Visakhapatnam, Nashik, Vasai, Surat, Delhi, Mumbai and Mapusa - in the first six weeks of this year, the company said in a statement.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
